## Client.listDecisionLogEntries() method

List decision log entries from the policy decision point server's audit log.

**Signature:**

```typescript
listDecisionLogEntries(request: ListDecisionLogEntriesRequest, options?: RequestOptions): AsyncGenerator<DecisionLogEntry, void, undefined>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

request


</td><td>

</td><td>


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[RequestOptions](./core.requestoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

AsyncGenerator&lt;[DecisionLogEntry](./core.decisionlogentry.md)<!-- -->, void, undefined&gt;

## Remarks

Requires

- the client to be configured with [Options.adminCredentials](./core.options.admincredentials.md)<!-- -->; and

- the Cerbos policy decision point server to be configured with

- the [admin API](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/api/admin_api) enabled

- the [local audit logging backend](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/configuration/audit#_local_backend)<!-- -->, and

- [decision logs](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/configuration/audit) enabled.

## Example


```typescript
for await (const entry of cerbos.listDecisionLogEntries({ filter: { tail: 5 } })) {
  console.log(entry);
}
```
